message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $150. I believe it offers excellent value, even at that price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80.
I appreciate your interest, Bob, but $80 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $120?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
